meanings.definition: A poisonous substance produced within living cells or organisms.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the toxines found in the venom of the snake.
meanings.sent2: It is important to be cautious of any toxines present in contaminated water.
meanings.sent3: The toxines in the plant made the insects feel very sick.
meanings.sent4: The toxines of jealousy can poison relationships.
meanings.sent5: The toxines in the air were so strong that everyone had to wear masks.

meanings.sent1: The cleanup crew wore protective gear to handle the toxines safely.
meanings.sent2: Exposure to toxines in the environment can have harmful effects on health.
meanings.sent3: The villain's plan involved spreading toxines in the city's water supply.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like toxines, poisoning his mind with doubt.
meanings.sent5: The toxines in the food caused a widespread illness outbreak.
